If there are Cute, Cool, and Passion idols on the team: Raises the Vocal appeal of all members by 80%.
If there are Cute, Cool, and Passion idols on the team: Raises the Vocal appeal of all members by 100%.
If there are Cute, Cool, and Passion idols on the team: Raises the Dance appeal of all members by 80%.

If there are Cute, Cool, and Passion idols on the team: Raises the skill probability of all members by 40%.
If there are Cute, Cool, and Passion idols on the team: Raises the skill probability of all members by 50%.
May give extra rewards when you finish a live. The drop rate scales based on star rank.
Increases fan gain by 32% when you finish a live.
Increases fan gain by 40% when you finish a live.
If there are Cool and Passion idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 20%, and the skill probability of all members by 25%.
If there are Passion and Cool idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 20%, and the life of all members by 15%.
If there are Cute and Passion idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 20%, and the fan gain of all members by 8%.
If there are Passion and Cute idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 20%, and the life of all members by 15%.
If there are Cute and Cool idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 20%, and the fan gain of all members by 8%.
If there are Cool and Cute idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 20%, and skill probability of all members by 25%.
If there are Cool and Passion idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 30%, and the skill probability of all members by 35%.
If there are Passion and Cool idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 30%, and the life of all members by 25%.
If there are Cute and Passion idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 30%, and the fan gain of all members by 10%.
If there are Passion and Cute idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 30%, and the life of all members by 25%.
If there are Cute and Cool idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 30%, and the fan gain of all members by 10%.
If there are Cool and Cute idols on the team: Raises all appeals of all members by 30%, and skill probability of all members by 35%.
If the team has at least 5 different skill types: Allows active skill effects to stack, but only the Vocal appeal of the team applies during the live.
If the team has at least 5 different skill types: Allows active skill effects to stack, but only the Dance appeal of the team applies during the live.
If the team has at least 5 different skill types: Allows active skill effects to stack, but only the Visual appeal of the team applies during the live.
Raises the XP, money, and friend points that you receive by 50% when you finish a live.
Raises this card s own Dance appeal by 100%. If this card s costume is equipped and on your own team, raises the Dance appeal of all members by 130% when her mask is removed.
May drop star pieces when you finish a live. The drop rate scales based on star rank.
Each member on your team will receive the best available leader effect from your team (including your guest s leader effect).
